title: New: Samson Ashe – Too Rough
body:
Londoner **Samson Ashes** arrives with a unique brand of soulful pop rarely seen coming from the UK.

Merging 80’s-esque hip-hop beats with really punchy, to the point songwriting, his debut track _Too Rough_ sits somewhere between Anderson Paak and Leon Bridges and leaves a really striking first impression. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Londoner Samson Ashes arrives with a unique brand of soulful pop rarely seen coming from the UK. Merging 80’s-esque hip-hop beats with really punchy, to the point songwriting, his debut track Too Rough sits somewhere between Anderson Paak and Leon Bridges and leaves a really striking first impression. Check it out below.
